tool.name: Lake Flood
tool.description: This tool can be used to flood a digital elevation model from seed points. Seed points have to be coded either with local water depth or absolute water level.<br/><br/>

param.name: SEEDS
param.label: Seeds
param.help: seed cells coded with local water depth or absolute water level, all other cells NoData

param.name: LEVEL
param.label: Absolute Water Levels
param.help: check this in case seed cells are coded with absolute water level
